name: Communication Mastery
description: Master the art of effective communication in professional settings.

levels.title: Foundations of Communication
levels.objective: Understand basic communication principles and active listening.
levels.description: Learn the core components of communication: sender, message, medium, receiver, and feedback. Focus heavily on active listening skills.
practices: Practice active listening in daily conversations
Summarize what others say to ensure understanding

levels.title: Clear & Concise Messaging
levels.objective: Articulate ideas clearly in both written and verbal forms.
levels.description: Develop the ability to express complex ideas simply. Focus on email etiquette, structuring presentations, and eliminating jargon.
practices: Write daily journal entries focusing on clarity
Practice the 'elevator pitch' for your current projects
Proofread emails for conciseness before sending

levels.title: Persuasion & Negotiation
levels.description: Learn techniques for persuasion, understanding audience needs, and finding win-win solutions in negotiations.
practices: Study successful speeches and analyze their structure
Practice advocating for a specific viewpoint in team meetings

resources.title: How to Win Friends and Influence People
